topic.title: Connect Your PC to the Router

ul.li: Unbox the router and power up the router.
Connect the Act internet cable to the WAN/Internet port (different colored port) of the router.
An extra cable will be available with the router, take LAN cable connect one end to the LAN port(1-4) Of the router (any one port) and one end to the PC or Laptop.
In the system press key & R key together to open Run dialog box.
Type ipconfig on the command prompt (Black screen). The default gateway of the LAN or Ethernet adapter will be the Router address. (Ex:192.168.1.1)
